reviewText: This is a walk down memory lane.  Not as scary as I remembered.  Weird interchange between film and videotape.  Quite the timepiece.  I'm glad we got this; but it's partly due to the nostalgia effect for me.
As an old pom,at 58,I found this series far exceeded my wildest expectations!!10/10 BRILLIANT STORIES/ACTORS....
I was so happy to have all seasons of this for my collection. i bought an all regions dvd player and this played perfectly.

This DVD set contains all 6 Series (43 one hour long episodes) of the UK TV series on 15 DVDs plus a bonus 16th disc with an extended version of the episode "If It's a Man, Hang Up". This british TV series was broadcast from 1973 to 1976 and should not be confused with Boris Karloff's Thriller US TV series from the early 1960's. Very enjoyable with high production values and outstanding acting.
